BriefTitle: Haploidentical Allogeneic Hematopoietic Stem Cell Transplantation in Children and Adolescents
BriefSummary: Purpose of study: This phase I/II trial is to evaluate the safety and feasibility of TCRαβ-depleted graft from haploidentical family donors in treating children and adolescents with malignant or non-malignant diseases.
